short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily identify rug pulls, honeypots, and scam tokens on the Solana blockchain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TokenSpy is the easiest tool to help identify crypto rug pulls, honeypots, and scam tokens on the Solana blockchain. It integrates seamlessly with your favorite websites and tools like Dexscreener and Dextools and can save you time and money.

1. Search tokens or click the button on Dexscreener or Dextools to look up tokens in seconds automatically
2. See if a Solana memecoin or token is likely a scam - you'll see an overall score our of 99 and other helpful information about it
3. See if the creator can still mint tokens, if the buy/sell tax can be changed, which wallet addresses hold the most coins, how much of the liquidity is locked, and much more

Installing and Using the TokenSpy Chrome Extension

1. Click the "ADD TO CHROME" button above
2. Click the "Add extension" option in the popup that appears 
3. Click the TokenSpy extension icon at the top of your browser window or visit a Solana token listing on Dexscreener or Dextools and click the TokenSpy icon that appears in the bottom right of the page
4. Enter a token's contract address into the search bar and click the search button to continue; alternatively, if you click the TokenSpy button on Dexscreener or Dextools, the total will be searched for you automatically
5. See if the token is likely a scam or not
